      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.String param1,
                      java.lang.Integer param2,
                      java.lang.Float param3)
               throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        113 subscribe Void (String,Int32,Float) Subscribes to the extractor. This causes the extractor to start writing information to memory using the keys described by getOutputNames(). These can be accessed in memory using ALMemory.getData("keyName"). In many cases you can avoid calling subscribe on the extractor by just calling ALMemory.subscribeToEvent() supplying a callback method. This will automatically subscribe to the extractor for you. name: Name of the module which subscribes. period: Refresh period (in milliseconds) if relevant. precision: Precision of the extractor if relevant.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.String param1)
               throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        114 subscribe Void (String) Subscribes to the extractor. This causes the extractor to start writing information to memory using the keys described by getOutputNames(). These can be accessed in memory using ALMemory.getData("keyName"). In many cases you can avoid calling subscribe on the extractor by just calling ALMemory.subscribeToEvent() supplying a callback method. This will automatically subscribe to the extractor for you. name: Name of the module which subscribes.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setAudioExpression

        public void setAudioExpression(java.lang.Boolean param1)
                        throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        128 setAudioExpression Void (Bool) Enables or disables the playing of sounds indicating the state of the recognition engine. If this option is enabled, a sound is played at the beginning of the recognition process (after a call to the subscribe method), and a sound is played when the user call the unsubscribe method setOrNot: Enable (true) or disable it (false).
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

If you want to set a language as the default language (loading automatically at module launch), please refer to the web page of the robot. languageName: Name of the language in English.

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.lang.String param1,
                         java.lang.Float param2)
                  throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        134 setParameter Void (String,Float) Sets a parameter of the speech recognition engine. Note that when the ASR engine language is set to Chinese, no parameter can be set. The parameters that can be set and the corresponding values are: "Sensitivity" - Values : range is [0.0; 1.0]. "Timeout" - Values : default values 3000 ms. Timeout for the remote recognition "MinimumTrailingSilence" : Values : 0 (no) or 1 (yes) - Applies a High-Pass filter on the input signal - default value is 0. paramName: Name of the parameter. paramValue: Value of the parameter.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.lang.String param1,
                         java.lang.Boolean param2)
                  throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        135 setParameter Void (String,Bool) Sets a parameter of the speech recognition engine. Note that when the ASR engine language is set to Chinese, no parameter can be set. The parameters that can be set and the corresponding values are: "Sensitivity" - Values : range is [0.0; 1.0]. "Timeout" - Values : default values 3000 ms. Timeout for the remote recognition "MinimumTrailingSilence" : Values : 0 (no) or 1 (yes) - Applies a High-Pass filter on the input signal - default value is 0. paramName: Name of the parameter. paramValue: Value of the parameter.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

                             throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException

        Throws:

      • setVocabulary

        public void setVocabulary(java.util.List<java.lang.String> param1,
                          java.lang.Boolean param2)
                   throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        138 setVocabulary Void (List,Bool) Sets the list of words (vocabulary) that should be recognized by the speech recognition engine. vocabulary: List of words that should be recognized enabledWordSpotting: If disabled, the engine expects to hear one of the specified words, nothing more, nothing less. If enabled, the specified words can be pronounced in the middle of a whole speech stream, the engine will try to spot them.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • pause

        public void pause(java.lang.Boolean param1)
           throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        139 pause Void (Bool) Stops and restarts the speech recognition engine according to the input parameter This can be used to add contexts, activate or deactivate rules of a contex, add a words to a slot. pause: Boolean to enable or disable pause of the speech recognition engine.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException
